summary: An acoustic guitar item. For role-playing purposes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Acoustic Guitar[/font][/size][/center]


[size=4][u][b]Description:

[/b][/u][size=3]This Mod just adds an Item in form of an Acoustic Guitar (from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36969/?]Stroti Resource Pack[/url]) to Skyrim.

I originally made it for my house mod and decided to release it seperatly.
It's just for role-playing purposes really...[/size]
[/size]


[size=4][u][b]Where to find it:[/b][/u][/size]

There is one standing around at the Riverwood Trader.


[size=5][u][b]CREDITS: [/b][/u][/size]

thanks a lot to:

[size=3][b]Bethesda[/b][/size] for the game and all the modding tools

[b][size=3]Stroti [/size][/b]for his guitar resources and basically all his other stuff ! Amazing !

[size=3][b]Tamira[/b][/size] for the converting Stroti's resources


[center]

author: G-Mus
